website_summaries.verdict: Not only is this a comfortable quality shirt, but it comes at a low price point making it a stellar value.
pros: The warm, soft flannel of this shirt is comfortable and breathable
Offers generous length, shirt can be tucked in or left untucked and still look stylish
cons: Some may find the buttons to be a bit small on this shirt

customer_reviews.title: Much Looser fit than the non-flannel amazon shirts.
customer_reviews.text: Soft flannel, so that's good. I like a boxy cut but this was too loose and too boxy. The shirt runs a bit long and I am six feet tall so must tuck it in. The non-flannel amazon men's shirts had a good fit but I think they went more baggy with the flannels. Would not buy more of them myself. Someone with a stockier frame might like these though
customer_reviews.author: techmannn

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth it, also plan to buy others
customer_reviews.text: Good Fit, good material and properly tailored. It's tailored so the front and rear are both the proper length and the cut gives it a proper shape, add to that a decent price this is a 5 Star product for sure. This is the first Amazon Essentials shirt I have tried out and I plan to get more seeing how impressed I am with this one. Hey it even has the extra buttons attached in case one gets lost, nice touch for this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Stonington

customer_reviews.title: Awesome flannel
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time ordering Amazon Essential branded clothing. Honestly, I wasn't expecting the best quality but hoping for it. As it turns out, this flannel shirt is great quality and the material is super soft. I can't yet speak for sizing, since I ordered it as Christmas gift for my husband, but it looks true to size. I can tell you this... it definitely doesn't look like it runs small at all. I'll be back to order more from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: lori7521

customer_reviews.title: Weird. But okay.
customer_reviews.text: Two weird things? Labels with edges as sharp as dull razor blades, constantly jabbing your neck. Literally had to remove them. Not a quick task. (See image.) The second weird thing? The pocket is waaaayyyy off the the side. This may be an anomaly on the larger shirts? (As if the pattern-maker locked-in to the distance from the sleeve without considering how it would look on a larger shirt.) Other than that? Comfortable. Seems to be made of decent material. Just that weirdness you'd expect when buying an "Amazon-branded" shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrob

customer_reviews.title: Please note that Amazon essential shirts run large
customer_reviews.text: I was curious to see how Amazon essential shirts were and ordered a few different products from the line. All shirts meets expectations and appear to be of high quality. I returned this particular product because it runs a bit large. Per my experience with the other Amazon essential shirts I ordered, all of them run large. So order one size down and you shouldn't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: srinidhi

customer_reviews.title: Greta shirt, they shrink in the wash.
customer_reviews.text: These shirts are great for the money. My only advice would be to order one size larger than you need. I’m 5’11 230lbs and they fit perfectly out of the box. After being laundered a couple times per label instructions, they have both shrunk to the point that they’re almost uncomfortable to wear. The sleeves are almost too short, and when I raise my hands above my head you can see my belt (and belly). But I assume ordering one size up would’ve fixed this issue. Also they’re very warm and easy to work in. I’d say go for it, just get a size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: A new bow hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great think soft flannel!
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'1" and 175. I bought the medium and as you can see in the pics its fits quite well. I actually would want it a little tighter, but I am sure it will shrink after more washes. The pics are after one wash on cold and low tumble dry. No iron. As you can see it doesn't wrinkle easily. Arms are actually a good length and I have longer arms then most my height. This is a very warm soft thick flannel. Great for cold weather and rainy days! I am buying more for sure now!!
customer_reviews.author: Rample

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2XL but fits like an XL
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 2XL shirt from Eddie Bauer, Lands End, Kohl's, and Walmart but the Amazon 2XL is a little skimpy. I tried it on before I washed it and noticed after washing (per instructions) that it was snug. If they offered a 3XL I would exchange it. I like the material and how well it came out of the wash without wrinkles. If I keep it, I can only wear it unbuttoned over a tee shirt. Very disappointed. If it fit correctly, I would be ordering more colors.
customer_reviews.author: David T.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband to wear for a Christmas party. We all had matching buffalo check outfits. My husband put it on before the party and it mostly fit, except one arm was significantly smaller than the other (cutting off circulation small). We had a laugh but overall it was annoying. He had to run out to the store on Christmas Eve to find a new shirt that matched our theme. We will be returning this one. I expected better since this was an actual Amazon brand.
customer_reviews.author: mar

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price! Hard to believe this shirt was under $20.00. Very nice quality control and fit is accurate with regard to the chart provided for the garment sizing. I now have 3 of these shirts and not a thread out of place on any of them. Great knock-around shirt and at under $20.00 you will not have a heart attack if you damage it while doing a project. My only suggestion to the Amazon product designers; Take it up a level on button size as most men's flannel shirts carry a larger button. These buttons are closer in size to a dress shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Not what is in the picture!!!
customer_reviews.text: While I was sent a nice, soft, 100% cotton, button down shirt, it looks nothing like the picture. The pattern, color, details and tag are all completely different from the shirt in the picture. The shirt I was sent arrived wrinkled up, with all the buttons undone. It looked like someone tried it on, rolled it into a ball and then sent it to me. Since I'm sure my boyfriend will like it anyways, I'm not going to return it, but I just wanted to warn others who may need exactly the shirt they are viewing.
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: Its a nice shirt made from quality material
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice shirt made from quality material. Seems like it would wear well and last a long time. However, I prefer a more modern slimmer fitting shirt. It has the square, boxy fit of an Eddie Bauer or LL Bean shirt. I bought these for work and casual wear...I may be 47, but I refuse to dress like I'm stuck in the 1990's business casual attire I see every day.
customer_reviews.author: Molly3Paws

customer_reviews.title: Flannel shirt
customer_reviews.text: Quality of flannel is as expected (or better) for the price. Brushed nap, soft not thin, or dense, or stiff. Collar and cuffs seem based on Patagonia shirts (i.e., narrow, a good thing). Pre-washing, XL is only a bit loose on body (regular fit for flannel shirts) if you often wear a large. Sleeves are about as expected in length for a Large size shirt. So, I would buy XL if you normally wear a Large dress shirt and want a Regular (i.e., loose fit) in a flannel shirt that may shrink a bit. This is not at all loose compared to 1950s Cary Grant shirts. Small buttons are another welcome reminder of popular and comfortable Patagonia shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised at the quality of these flannels! They are decently thick feeling for a flannel and the colors are great. Got these as a gift but they are so nice I might just get myself a couple! Definitely would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Spookyprincess

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, could be a little bit more fitted
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Medium. I'm 24, 5' 7", 175lbs. I have broader shoulders, so the fit was actually pretty comfortable and the material is high quality and soft. However, I like things a little slimmer and fitted, this was on the looser end, though not terrible. The only downside I saw was that the shirt is a bit long, more than I'd like in the front when I pair it with another layer or something. But I ended up tucking in the shirt and it looked fine, and it was very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Mun

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered a medium based on a few reviews giving their measurements and the size they ordered. I guess they like their clothing tight so I should not have listened. I returned the medium and they sent me a large which I figured was the right size anyway. I have washed and dried and it fits perfectly. The sleeves are a little long but I am a female. It fits my husband's arms perfectly and he is 6'. I love it. It is very soft and warm and customer service was excellent when I was not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey G

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt fit's good. Nice and soft.
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 red shirts today and they fit just right. Ordered a med thats what i wear most of the time and it fit good. Bright colors on the shirt. I wouldn't order a size down r up because my med i ordered fit me like other med shirts do. The shirts are made in Honduras. Good fit and soft shirt for cool weather. Real cold weather you would have to wear something else under the shirt to be warmer. I ordered 2 blue shirts they should be here tomorrow. Good shirts will order them again. Has one pocket on the left side. Tag says made 100% cotton. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great for an athletic build.
customer_reviews.text: I always fit into XL shirts. Not this one. This shirt is not described as "trim fit" but it is closer to that than a classic fit. On the other hand the sleeves were a tad long so if I return it for an XXL the sleeves will cover my knuckles. I'm returning for a refund. Back to LL Bean for my shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Seeg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: I've been testing out more Amazon Essential clothing and after a good experience with the polos I tried the flannels which are equally amazing. They are not athletic cut and provide some looseness which I look for in a flannel. They are thicker than most brands and closer in fit and quality to the older American Eagle flannels which were awesome. If you are looking for a form fitting, inside flannel this may disappoint you but if you want a good looking and well made flannel shirt suitable for outside work you may be very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Goblin

customer_reviews.title: soft & Thick quality!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this flannel! i'm 5'6 I got a 2XL- wanted it to be loose and baggy. Its on the thicker side and soft! Feels like very good quality, worth every penny! will definitley be buying more!!
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Very oversized
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the shirt is no problem. I normally wear an XL but this shirt would wrap around my like I was a small size. Not happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: What is with this sizing??
customer_reviews.text: I am the same size of button up shirt across every brand I have ever tried. Not this one. This thing is longer than the unedited version of War and Peace.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G

customer_reviews.title: XXL apparently does not mean long arms
customer_reviews.text: The feel of the material is great! The color and design is perfect. The cut and fit in the shoulders and even the torso is good. But what is it about XXL sizes that would lead manufacturers to think that XXL people don't have longer arms?? This shirt falls in with almost every other "long" sleeved shirt I've purchased online, the sleeves are woefully short. It should be labeled as a 3/4 sleeve, not a long sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Dreyer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Flannels. Amazon hit a home run with their own Essentials line. Returned many others b4.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with these Amazon Essential Flannel shirts. Great selection of my favorite "earthy" colors. The fit was just right for me and the quality of fabric and workmanship is very good. Being quite fussy about my Flannels, I bought one to check out first (they offer free return shipping anyway) and then went back and bought 10 more assorted colors. I think it was a brilliant idea for Amazon to do their research and solicit customer feedback in order to get everything just right when creating their own line of Flannels. I can validate their claim that the quality and sizes are all the same; their factory must have advanced process control measures. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Young Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: Another Quality Shirt from Amazon Essentials
customer_reviews.text: I already own a few of the Amazon Essentials shirts...and while maybe not truly essential - they are solid quality that I've had no complaints about. Unlike many of the faux-flannel shirts out there - this is actually a decent thickness to be worn on cooler days...but nice enough for office wear on a more casual day. I paid $18 for this shirt and in the same order $25 for a similar pattern Goodthreads - and would have been much more satisfied with another one of these Essential shirts.
customer_reviews.author: R Scott

customer_reviews.title: Far Better Than Expected For This Price
customer_reviews.text: Shockingly good for this price. Not substantially different from the $80 Pendleton Hawthorne shirt (made in China) at less than 1/4 of the price. Fits me better than Pendleton with slightly narrower shoulders & longer arms. It pains me to say it but at this price I can buy every color and if they wear out every few years I can buy them again four times over and still be ahead of the game. I give up, Amazon wins again.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Landon

customer_reviews.title: A little light
customer_reviews.text: When I read the reviews for this shirt, most said that the flannel was medium weight. I like the way it fits and I really like the plaid colors. However, this shirt is what I would call a light weight flannel. My wife gave me two Lands End flannels for Christmas 13 months ago. I wear them every week during winter months. I had hoped these shirts would work for winter as well as the Lands End. Not so much. They fit well, they look good, but they're a little light for winter wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Radke

customer_reviews.title: Sleeves shrunk about 3" when washed, and another inch or two 2nd wash
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, super soft and comfortable. The sleeves were even a bit long at first - HA! I washed it in cold water and dried on low, and the body only shrunk a bit, but the sleeves shrunk a ton. After one wash my watch was no longer covered, and after a second wash they were closer to 3/4 sleeves. I'm not sure I dare to wash it a 3rd time...
customer_reviews.author: Justin Walker

customer_reviews.title: From 5 stars to 1, shrank SO MUCH after wash
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: This item is not pre-shrunk. After washing and drying, I need to oil myself up and use a shoehorn to get into this shirt. It shrank at least 1 full size. I've never had an article of clothing that shrank so much after washing and drying. As a not a small man, all I care about is the second top button on a buttoned shirt. As George Costanza says, "The second button literally makes or breaks the shirt!" So true with thick-necked gents. This shirt—large—is proportioned right. The second button won't try to kill you while you doff this flannel. Also, great price, great material, and great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: The fit is great....but the length...
customer_reviews.text: For reference, I am 5'10"....195-200lbs. I have a moderately athletic build. So...I was super excited to see a nicely priced flannel shirt on Amazon Basics. The shirt is well made, medium weight, and fits well. What I didn't like, however, was the overall length of the shirt. I was hoping to wear this in a un-tucked casual manner...but to me...it was simply too long. I'd say I have an average length torso...so...I'd say this is something you want to try on before you remove any tags...
customer_reviews.author: pcpeggs

customer_reviews.title: The material is very good. If you like real flannel shirt don't think ...
customer_reviews.text: I just bought it for my husband. We got it yesterday. My husband really likes it! The material is very good. If you like real flannel shirt don't think twice go for it. The actual print was not exactly what I was looking for, I like the red, black and thin white stripes kind but that color combination was not available on amazon's brand so I got this one instead, because the material is good so I am ok with the color and I like that he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Best flannel shirt I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical of buying clothing from Amazon's brand, but this shirt has far exceeded my expectations and has for sure motivated me to buy more clothing from Amazon Essentials. It's extremely comfortable and fits perfectly. I'm 6'4" with an athletic build and a large conforms perfectly to my chest and mid-section. It's the perfect length too -- a little below the belt, but not too far down the thigh.
customer_reviews.author: Alex R.

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly high quality - and is was NOT made in China! I was so happy to find a good flannel shirt not made in China. The flannel is a nice thickness (not too thin and not too thick). It easily compares to flannels at 2X the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Smells like green spirit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an add on to an outfit as part of a “grunge” aesthetic, and its a nice accessory. I did buy a size up, an XL, because it is 100% cotton (bound to shrink, although i haven’t really noticed that yet) and I wanted a relaxed fit to it. It does not feel skimpy, and per Amazons’ standard, it is not bad quality, everything considered. The color is nice, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Vivid

customer_reviews.title: Soft Flannel, True to Size
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is a soft, medium-thickness flannel. I disagree with other reviewers that say it runs small. It seems to run true to size. I would order the regular size. I ordered a size up (large) to accommodate a person's arm injury, and it is working out fine. The color is as shown. The shirt washes well, and if it shrinks, it is only a small amount.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymouse In A House

customer_reviews.title: Nice flannel shirt, great price
customer_reviews.text: Totally impressed with this flannel shirt from Amazon. Ordered this for my hubby in the winter to wear around the house, or over a tshirt, so for the price I was not expecting this nice feel and quality. I washed it twice so far, once prior to him wearing it and then again after his first wearing and it got softer. Going to order a few more to stockup. They may not hold up with hard use, but for what he needs them for, it it great!
customer_reviews.author: Half-Baked59

customer_reviews.title: 5' 6" guy review, doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: Sleeves must be taken down around 2-3", as usual, being a short guy. The waist is never tucked in on any of my shirts so another option besides sleeve length would be appreciated. So just my usual problem of needing a shirt not designed to be tucked in and mutated super sleeve length, but otherwise besides 3 annoying tags which I immediately removed because I need clothing without tags for comfort, great lightweight material. There may be problems having the sleeves taken down because they are too close to actual sleeve length required.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet Jester

customer_reviews.title: Looks better in person
customer_reviews.text: The studio lighting used to get the picture doesn't do the style justice. It doesn't look as radiantly blaring and blinding in the typical lighting situations one would actually find oneself in. They overkilled on the brightness for the display pictures. As such, my opinion ia that it looks better and far less glaring in person - but you would just have to get it in front of you to actually realize and understand how much better it looks in person. Fits right. Material seems good. Time will tell how it holds up to washings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shirt for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt. I'm not super into flannel and i bought it for a costume, but if I was I would be all over these. They are soft and feel solid. Medium weight material not too hot/stuffy but warm enough for a mildly cold day (without a jacket I mean). looks good, nice size squares. Will modify my review if it curls up or does anything weird.
customer_reviews.author: TheGuy

customer_reviews.title: sleeves too short for me
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a large, but I found the sleeves to be too short. I do have longish arms, which is why I don't wear a medium. I returned the large and got the extra large. It's way too big, but its comfortable (very) and I wear it at home. Edit: about two months later several of the button holes began fraying. This causes the button to hang up on a loose thread. My wife can stitch it up, but this is a sign of poor quality. Your mileage may vary. Luck of the draw.
customer_reviews.author: eTech

customer_reviews.title: I love the amazon essentials button ups!
customer_reviews.text: I love the amazon essentials button up shirts. I bought the cotton Oxford ones before and this was the first flannel one. They’re always nice, quality material, they wash well, they keep their shape and color, they’re frequently under $20. I seriously keep buying them for myself (female, pretty business casual workplace. I love the cotton ones under a cardigan. General fan of flannel as well. both Inside and Outside of work I suppose lol) and for my boyfriend (who is a little more on the picky end of the spectrum when it comes to shirt fit). He likes them too. They’re great
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: I got "Bright Blue Plaid", and it is a very attractive shirt
customer_reviews.text: It's actually not that bright of a blue. It's an intense, dark blue a few shades lighter than navy, IMO. I love the subtle green stripes. No way this looks like an $18 shirt to me. Looks and feels much more expensive. I'm 6'0, 255, and carry most of my weight in my mid-section. XX-Large fits me perfectly, with just a little extra room around the mid section and nice fit in the shoulders and chest. I'm going to be wearing this untucked, and it's a good length for that for me. I think it works well as a button-up shirt, or as a light jacket that you could wear a t-shirt underneath.
customer_reviews.author: AbsolutelyGenuineReviewerTrustMe

customer_reviews.title: Great medium weight flannel and look good too
customer_reviews.text: Great medium weight flannel and look good too. 5'9" Male, 175lbs and the medium fit comfortable, but depends on how you wear them.. If you want them over sweat shirts, go a size larger. I wear mine with a T shirt on underneath and it doesn't hang off me. I already washed them and minimal/no shrinkage.
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shirt for cosplay purposes. I'm cosplaying Denki Kaminari at Katsucon 2020 and the outfit I envisioned for him had a yellow flannel tied around his waist. I searched online for one and I found this one! I got an XS since I'm between 5'5" and 5'6". As for the purpose I intended it for, the shirt is great! The shirt is of great quality and the material feels nice, not itchy at all. As far as I can tell, I will only be using this shirt as an accessory (tied around the waist for an outfit), but overall it's a nice shirt!
customer_reviews.author: Reyjr L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but fits small
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful shirt, well made, nice material but these sizes are not true to size. If you are big don't bother. If you're an XL this will fit like a large or even a medium. Depends on how you want to shirt to fit (looser, snug etc)
customer_reviews.author: KLo

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Mid weight shirt and nice quality....better 'n I expected. I normally wear a 17x33 in a dress shirt and this was just a touch snug in the body, not too long in the tails and the right sleeve length...... Great plaid match for the pocket. Overall, I do recommend it...great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: cpj

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt, great price. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shirt, colors are even better than in the online pictures. Fits great. I bought men's medium, mens tend to fit me better. Its roomy enough to also wear a tee shirt under. Shirt is light weight, perfect for Oregon weather. Highly recommend, I will be buying another color.
customer_reviews.author: D. Peck

customer_reviews.title: New fav shirt
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed with plaid and flannel but it's super hard to find anything that fits me the way I like. I'm a size 27, SM in women's clothes but i have super long arms and torso. I usually go for husky boys flannels but I took a chance with Amazon brand and ordered an XS. I'm glad I did, it's my new favorite shirt and I'm planning to order a few more since they were only ~$5. 😍 my wardrobe is going through a big change while I work from home, a big priority now is the coziness factor.
customer_reviews.author: B. laurenson

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, value, fabric and construction...
customer_reviews.text: Great fit & value. Good quality fabric and construction. Has held up well through the wash with minimal shrinkage. I'm not someone who gets embarrassed or caught up in clothing labels. I did get compliments on the shirt when I wore it and people were surprised that this was an Amazon brand shirt. I've been impressed with all of the Amazon essential clothing items I've bought.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect flannel .
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an oversized flannel and thought the small would be tight but it was perfect. The material feels thick, soft and very comfortable. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NinaPurr

customer_reviews.title: Runs Large
customer_reviews.text: I bought the small, but was afraid it would end up too big after I washed it. Exchanged it for the medium and kept it, washed and dried it, but it was way too big. The jump from small to medium is huge. Plus, the cut is boxy and unflattering. I won't mention the cheap fabric; that I expected. At 5'11" 150 lbs., I should just get used to wearing a small.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Feeney

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'9" and weigh 170 pounds. I ordered a medium shirt and it fits perfectly. This shirt is reasonably priced and I'm well pleased with the purchase. I recommend these "Amazon Essential" shirts without hesitation. 09/20: The above review was for the first shirt I bought, and was automatically added as a review for this particular shirt. Regardless, the review applies to this shirt as well; very nice, warm shirts at a reasonable price,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this shirt for my husband and we were both impressed with it. Husband is 6’2 at 240 and the XL fit him great. Shirt fit good on his broad shoulders, sleeve length was right where it should and the XL was not too tight or or loose around his waist. Initially I did not think the shirt would have held up to the first wash but it priced me wrong. Shirt held up well to washing and drying and still looks fantastic. Will be ordering same shirt in different colors for my husband soon.
customer_reviews.author: Ernstal08

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like this shirt too heavy and material was not comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to find a flannel shirt card find by Amazon and I thought that this was it but it isn’t. It’s a lot thicker and not comfortable at all. Once I found the find brand I haven’t gone to any other flannel shirt it’s very thin and comfortable material. I would get one size up and then that way you can wash and dry it without it shrinking it does spread all over your clothing so if you wash your red one you will have red all over your black shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Dabloesco

customer_reviews.title: Good job Amazon for providing the essentials
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for family Christmas pictures, color matches pictures shown almost exactly. Husband normally wears and XL and took the advice of other reviews and ordered and XXL, fits perfectly. Structured shirt, well-made. Good job Amazon for providing the essentials, will definitely be purchasing a few more for my husband. He asked what brand the shirt was because he said it felt so well made.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with this shirt
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shirt to use for a Halloween party. However, I've already worn it. This shirt is so soft and really high quality. I am normally a women's size 6/medium. I ordered this in a medium so I could wear it 90s grunge style. It worked great. But, as an every day, casual shirt it wears kind of like a tunic. It's a little fitted on the sides which is super cute. I've worn it with leggings and with jeans. Might be my new favorite flannel. I think I need more colors.
customer_reviews.author: aukalou

customer_reviews.title: Runs Large
customer_reviews.text: I loved the quality of this, but the medium was VERY large. My husband is 5'7", weighs about 160 pounds and this was like an XL on him. I was sad we had to return it. It would have been great for family photos.
customer_reviews.author: EA

customer_reviews.title: Look good, feel good and wonderful value.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time, fit perfectly and wonderfully comfortable. The fact that the shirts are 100% cotton is even better because of no static during the winter months when touching a door knob or other metal unlike similar shirts with poly materials added.. Look good and feel good. I bought two more after getting the first shirt and loving it. And, absolutely wonderful value.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Parish

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shirt and realized that it was an amazon brand, I was a bit skeptical of how it would fit, BUT it fit perfect for me. I have received multiple compliments from strangers and they are very surprised when I tell them that it’s amazon essentials flannel. I will definitely order again in a different color. This shirt is perfect for the winter time. Not too thick nor too thin, just right 👌🏼
customer_reviews.author: Rogelio Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I figured I would give the amazon brand a chance since I needed some flannel shirts. I was honestly blown away by the quality and fit. I ended up ordering a second because I liked it so much. The material is good and feels durable without being too heavy, it's really soft and comfortable too. I ordered my normal size and it fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fabric, sharp colors, but sizing is odd
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened these, they were comically large. After a wash and dry, the sleeves are reasonable, but the length is crazy. I feel like a kid wearing mommy's dress. Suspicious that Amazon might be unloading a factory of big and tall stock that big and talls aren't buying. Reviews are all over the place regarding sizing, so who knows? Super nice shirts, but they'll be strictly around-the-house garb for me. Bought two, won't get anymore. This was my first Amazon Basics clothing purchase and I'm spooked by the brand now.
customer_reviews.author: Numo Calligese

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: The Best! My husband and son , son in law all love the Amazon brand better than name brand i usually buy ! Soft , nice fit and colors! Will buy every Xmas Thank you Amazon well made product ! I would highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: 707Tamtam

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your $$$
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and already had 2 compliments. Also, went to a local closeout place that had a lot of these shirts.. $1 cheaper but the fabric is about HALF as thick (think almost like t-shirt/undershirt material). Almost got one that looked nice, but was wearing this one and felt the difference in material so I passed on it... and, bought another one from here in blue.
customer_reviews.author: MrMega

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, comfortable and good quality at an excellent price! Bought some for my husband after his shoulder surgery, because he can't lift his arm, needs to be able to work sleeve up with a button-down shirt. These are so comfy and he looks great in them! Plus the price was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that Amazon's shirts would live up to the hype but I was wrong. This short fits well, if only slightly baggier than I would like, and is very soft and comfortable. I plan to buy more of these because they are great for everyday wear and can be dressed up if need be. Another great product from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Charles M.

customer_reviews.title: A very value for the money
customer_reviews.text: My husband has worn these shirts since high school. He needed new ones and we were afraid that we could not replace his old ones. We were so happy when the shipment arrived. The shirts were everything that we expected and more. They are so soft even before washing. They are wrinkle resistant and the colors are beautiful. They are warm and cool at the same time. The fit is perfect as if they were tailored to my husband. He is ecstatic.
customer_reviews.author: Cartec

customer_reviews.title: Appearance excellent, but check sizing
customer_reviews.text: The colors are exactly right for my collegiate colors and matching the pattern on the pocket and placket to the body was good also. However, I'm rating the shirt down slightly because the fabric is very thin to be considered "flannel." Be sure to check the sizing chart carefully before ordering — I had to order one size larger than similar casual shirts I've ordered from other suppliers.
customer_reviews.author: Curmudgeon

customer_reviews.title: Men's Shirt is Good Quality at Affordable Price
customer_reviews.text: My new men's long-sleeved checkered shirt is good quality at an affordable price. It fits me well. I'm 5'8" and about 176 pounds and I have a lean physique. It's a comfortable shirt and it washes well in the the washing machine and I hang it upon a hanger and allow it to air dry. Good price and value. Good texture and quality. I would buy more of these shirts soon.
customer_reviews.author: Writergeek

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great flannel
customer_reviews.text: Fit is exact for me (Large, 5-foot-9, 190 lbs). The quality of the fabric is much better than I expected, soft and full. I've bought flannel shirts for twice this much that were thinner and the fabric felt tough and scratchy. This is a new favorite.
customer_reviews.author: AndyH3000

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for  the  price
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his flannel shirts and he really loved the 3 Amazon brand shirts I purchased for him for Christmas. They are the right thickness - not thin but not too thick either. They are comfortable inside and out. This shirt is soft and fit well. It was true to size. I will continue to purchase this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brittony M.

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight flannel
customer_reviews.text: My first time buying an Amazon Essential brand. I was worried it would either be too small or too big, but just like Goldilocks in the three bears I fit perfectly In a size medium lol I would say it’s true to size since I wear a medium. It’s a lightweight flannel which I was looking for. I ordered four and now I’m thinking of ordering more... Edit I bought two more lol and thinking of buying another if or when it’s back in stock
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Very nice medium+ weight shirt
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleasantly happy with this Amazon shirt, so much so that I ordered a second one. Fits very well and the weight of the flannel is heavier than I expected. I wanted something warm for outdoors while wearing over another shirt, and while this isn't wool-like heavyweight it also isn't thin flannel, just right for me as an over-shirt for cool temps. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Doug M.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight flannel - Color not as pictured - Good price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very light weight flannel. Buyer will want to size up to layer in cold weather. Color (blue) dark, not as bright, less contrast than pictured. Long body length and long sleeve length. I sized up and that was good, except the sleeve length. Comfortable. An average quality, light weight flannel shirt, but for the price not a bad value.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Wash before you judge!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these shirts: The red buffalo plaid and the navy/green plaid in size "S". I really love the fit of men's shirts and these fit perfectly. When I first opened the nicely packaged shirts I thought they were kind of thin and stiff, but nicely made. But after washing, I think these shirts are much thicker and soft. Really happy with the quality. I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have extremely high expectations from an Amazon branded shirt. I purchased it to see how the quality was and use as a work shirt. I am pleasantly surprised. The material is soft and comfortable. While the fit is slightly loose I don't mind, it will be easy to use as an extra layer in the fall. I can't speak on the durability yet but all in all I am happy with the purchase. Enough so that I am ordering a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Charron Jr.

customer_reviews.title: what to say?
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these jackets, but find this jacket lighter than the others, while it offers the same warmth. Living in Maine requires something like this, for those months between summer and winter snows.
customer_reviews.author: Rendo

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly soft. Look and feel high end. Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a fitted flannel. Fits my husband perfectly! Ordered 3 and will definitely be ordering more. These are great with a light undershirt as well and are incredibly soft. He works in a shop and so these are perfect for the colder months. For reference he is about 5'10, 160lbs, athletic build.
customer_reviews.author: Harleyrglide

customer_reviews.title: not that great, too short and too wide which is too ...
customer_reviews.text: not that great, too short and too wide which is too bad because the shirt felt nice and the color was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Oni

customer_reviews.title: Fit Great
customer_reviews.text: My hubby has added a "few" pounds since retiring, but was still trying to wear his old shirts. I finally had enough of walking around with a man who looked 12 months preggo and just bought him some new shirts. These fit great, even after several washings. They are long enough for him, the sleeves are long enough, and all the buttons button around the retired Dad Bod.
customer_reviews.author: christie

customer_reviews.title: Washes up fine.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend who seemed to have all sorts of requirements from a flannel?????? Who knew, anyway, so,...... I bought these for him to "try" only to find out that the main requirement is how do they wash up, that makes them impossible to return. Fortunately they went through the wash in a manner that satisfied him, he wears them all the time. Layering without being bulky was another requirement and he is satisfied with that too:)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas. He tends to wear out the elbows of his shirts pretty fast. The material is extremely soft. Only issue is that my boyfriend is a petit man. I looked at his shirts in the closet and they were a medium, so this is what I ordered. I had to return it, because it was too big. I had to re-order and get a size small.
customer_reviews.author: Ccbilbo

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This flannel shirt is extremely soft, lightweight, and comfortable. It has vibrant colors that are very eye appealing. It fits very well; not too short or too long, and has ample room for physical movement without me feeling like I’m constricted. To summarize, this is a nice work or leisure shirt. I highly recommend you getting one or more.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Asher

customer_reviews.title: Nice overall, but a tad long (for a short guy)
customer_reviews.text: Great fabric. Nice and soft. Not super thick, but it's still quite warm. I'm 5'7", 185... stocky and solid but not fat. It fits nicely across the chest neck and waist, but a shade longer than I prefer. But again, I'm on the shorter side. All things considered, it's a great buy for the price and I'll probably get another one or two.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C.

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Fits right
customer_reviews.text: Vibrant color. Didn't shrink too much. I always have a problem picking between medium and large shirts. I got medium at first. It was a little snug so I gave that to my son. Large is just right. Enough room to move around. I wanted to order another color but it is now unavailable. Large must he most popular size. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: David Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run large
customer_reviews.text: I exchanged a shirt for a size smaller than I usually wear because the original was like a tent at the waist! I'd describe myself as stocky and normally wear a Large; I went down to a Medium. The Medium fit is okay at the chest and waist but the arms are now a bit short. This is my second identical experience with Amazon Essentials shirts - the other was with a short sleeve shirt. Amazon Essentials shirts seem to run big, particularly so at the waist.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shirt
customer_reviews.text: My son is not a flannel guy but I saw this color and thought he would look very handsome in it. Well, he does! Came home embarrassed that a girl had told him he looked nice. This shirt is so beautiful, the colors pop and he learned he looks great in a flannel!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Smoothest Flannel I Own, Cheapest Too
customer_reviews.text: Fit is just a tad bit larger than I expected, but my weight fluctuates so often, that’s not really a negative. Smoothest flannel I’ve had (and I own a ton) and is thick and comfy. True to color and came at a fantastic price compared to other flannels I’ve bought. I’ll definitely be ordering more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Love the pattern and bright yellow color
customer_reviews.text: I had shoulder and bicep surgery a week ago and for ease of dressing the doctor told me to wear button down blouses/shirts. I also wanted warmth and couldn't find any women's flannel shirts that I liked. I was very pleased with the quality and look when the shirt arrived and have had several compliments on the shirt when wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L. Kingsley

customer_reviews.title: IT’S TRUE, this is the perfect flannel shirt
customer_reviews.text: OMG the raving reviews are all true. This is a perfect flannel shirt. I’m a woman but was looking for a roomy and comfy lounging shirt. Everyone is right, this is thick and soft and so well-made. There are even two buttons on each wrist to adjust the fit. What a great bargain. Probably will buy a few more for me and my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Dru

customer_reviews.title: The shirt looks nice and the quality seems pretty good just too tight
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 2x and it is too snug in the mid section. If you are a skinny guy - go for it. The shirt looks nice and the quality seems pretty good just too tight!
customer_reviews.author: JUstme

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: If you have a bit of a belly, I would size up for sure without a doubt. Luckily my husband doesn't so the size large works. Not sure if this shirt well shrink in the wash/dryer. I am just going to wash and hang it to dry for safe measures. Overall I like the shirt and the price you just can't beat!
customer_reviews.author: T. S

customer_reviews.title: Runs large, but a nice shirt.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium (he normally wears a large), and the fit is perfect, so keep that in mind. Matched plaid is great. Buttons are a tad small, but manageable. Fabric weight is not too thick, but not at all thin. Washes beautifully, no shrinkage, no iron if removed promptly from the dryer. Good quality. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Rubber Duck

customer_reviews.title: Great price, poor fit. Baggy
customer_reviews.text: Wow, no go on these shirts. There is absolutely zero fit. You can tell they are mass produced in a factory with little fit in mind. I sent mine back after trying it on. Quality seems to be ok.
customer_reviews.author: T.Michael

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit
customer_reviews.text: XL Not. Tight around chest and under arms. Sleeves too long. Poor fit. I gave it away rather than return it.
customer_reviews.author: Orville Roach

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. It's a little bigger than I was expecting but for the look I was going for it was fine, you could definitely size down one.
customer_reviews.author: sincerely_whit

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love these flannels. Probably have more than I need. They are so comfortable though! I wear them in the spring in the fall outside and around the house in the winter has a housecoat to save on heating. I am 6 feet tall and about 180-85 pounds in the large fits me perfect. You just have to be very careful about the dryer they will shrink to nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S McCurdy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little unsure of ordering my normal large size shirt because of the many ratings that said it was larger than expected. I am very pleased with quality and fit. This replaces my favorite flannel shirt that our new dog pulled out of the laundry basket and chewed up. Here's hoping I can keep this one out of her jaws!
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Trimm

customer_reviews.title: A Good Quality Shirt
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband, and was surprised at the quality. It's a good quality shirt, of decent thickness for a flannel shirt. The color is just as shown in the photo. My husband has worn it several times, and washes well with little to no shrinkage. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki JS

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the way this shirt fit based on size, did not shrink. Now there are none available, would have bought this same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Flanny Make Me Go Bananny
customer_reviews.text: Very nice I got the yellow and love it it is not a super thick material but not thin either and I find it just very comfortable because it’s warm without being too hot you can just wear it over a T-shirt or over a thicker shirt if you want more warms but very comfy and very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: The Green Eagle

product_meta.title: Amazon Essentials Men's Regular-Fit Long-Sleeve Plaid Flannel Shirt
product_meta.description:
An Amazon brand - Allover plaid and midweight flannel make this button-up shirt a go-to pick when the temperature drops

Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of men’s must-haves includes polo shirts, chino pants, classic-fit shorts, casual button-downs, and crew-neck tees. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort
feature_bullets: Allover plaid and midweight flannel make this button-up shirt a go-to pick when the temperature drops
Patch chest pocket, rounded hem and barrel cuffs
Same fit, new name: We’ve changed the name of this shirt style to “Regular Fit” but the measurements remain the same
Everyday made better: we listen to customer feedback and fine-tune every detail to ensure quality, fit, and comfort
Model is 6'2" and wearing size Medium
